com.Leo.Game

类 Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Leo.Game.Hero
  • 直接已知子类:
    Master, Shooter

    public abstract class Hero
extends java.lang.Object
    Hero abstract class

    There are two types of heroes, enemy heroes and user-controlled heroes.Both the user side and the enemy hero can fire bullets, which can change the path of walking, and change direction when encountering obstacles such as walls and game boundaries during walking, but not always holding obstacles. Heroes can't cross each other, and automatically change direction after collision.

    The attributes of the hero: speed (speedX, speedY), the size of the hero (length, width), the new position of the hero (x,y), whether the hero is still alive (live), the direction of action (direction), etc. All of these properties have an initialization value that can be run from the beginning of the game.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    Leo

        robot - User or machine

    • 方法详细资料

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Hero drawing abstract method
        参数:
        g - Graphics

      • move

        void move()
        Heros move method

        The position after the user side is monitored by the keyboard and forwards at a constant speed in the specified direction - this speed is a global static variable and remains stationary when no keyboard control is received.

        The enemy's hero controls random directions and paths based on random numbers.

      • changToOldDir

        protected void changToOldDir()
        Hero movement method

        When the enemy hero hits the obstacle, it will return to the position of the previous step, thus solving the problem that the hero hits the obstacle and does not look back. This function is implemented by the changToOldDir() method in the hero class.

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Keyboard operation method

        The keyPressed() method of the hero class is used to accept the keystrokes of the keyboard. After receiving the corresponding keyboard information, if F is received, it means that the bullet is fired, so the fire() method in the hero class is called at this time, fire() The method does not pass arguments because the direction of the bullet is always subordinate to the direction and position of the hero.

        参数:
        e - Keyboard event

      • decideDirection

        void decideDirection()
        Hero direction decision method

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Keyboard release method
        参数:
        e - Keyboard event

      • fire

        public Bullets fire()
        Hero fire attack effect

        Determines whether the fire attack exists, does not exist, returns null, if it exists, initializes the new bullet position coordinates and adds it to the bullet container

        返回:
        Bullet object
